data.meta_site_name: Henry Clay Baldwin IV Obituary | May 24, 2020 | DellaVecchia, Reilly, Smith & Boyd Funeral Home, Inc. - West Chester, PA
data.text:
Henry Clay Baldwin IV

Clay Baldwin left this earth on Sunday, May 24, 2020.

He is survived by his wife, Lisa (Skemer) Baldwin, his children, Jackie Vincent (Danny), J.J. Geewax (Ka-el), Allison Geewax (Henry Emslie), Stephanie Geewax (Duncan Shallcross), & Catherine Geewax and her fiancé (Ari Ross). He is also survived by his two grandsons, Owen Clay Vincent, and James Julius Robert Emslie. Survivors include his sister, Heather (Baldwin) Hunter (F.E. Tuck Hunter) and his nephew Tucker Hunter.

Clay’s life has been one of love, joy for life, and an uncommon level of generosity and kindness to others. Clay is the personification of a life lived to the fullest.
